condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

description.narrative: The diversification of partnerships, through the involvement of Civil Society Organizations (CSO), has been critical in building and consolidating of a C4D platform contributing to the improvement of a cross-sectoral approach and to a better geographical coverage. Nevertheless, most efforts of the section concentrated to respond to public health emergencies (polio, measles, Hepatitis E), response to natural disasters (flooding) and preparedness to Ebola Virus Disease (EVD). The Accountability to Affected Population (AAP) programme kicked off and played an essential role in informing the Humanitarian Needs Overview (HNO) and the Humanitarian Response plan (HRP) through the conduction of perception surveys. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:17/12/2019
